description: Triangle of asymmetric mobiles (circular rooted trees) with n nodes and k leaves.
links: Index entries for sequences related to mobiles
formula: G.f. satisfies A(x, y) = x*(y - Sum_{i>0} moebius(i)/i * log(1 - A(x^i, y^i))). - _Michael Somos_, Aug 19 2015Sum_k T(n, k) = A032171(n). - _Michael Somos_, Aug 24 2015
prog: (PARI) {T(n, k) = my(A = O(x)); if(k<1 || k>n, 0, for(j=1, n, A = x*y - x*sum(i=1, j, moebius(i)/i * log(1 - subst( subst( A + x * O(x^j), x, x^i), y, y^i) ) )); polcoeff( polcoeff(A, n), k))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 24 2015 */
author: _Christian G. Bower_, May 15 2000
